data.name: CmdArgUsage
data.value:
Usage: KurobaChan [Options]
Options: --service Start KurobaChan in service mode (silent mode) --show Show current KurobaChan instance main window (This option will not work if "Enhanced Security Mode" is enabled) --help Show this help message

data.name: StartError.Permission.UAC
data.value: Requested operation requires elevated privilege. Please try to run KurobaChan with administrator privilege.

data.name: FirstStart.UserAgreement
data.value: You are aware that KurobaChan needs to work through Win32 API with "Low-Level Keyboard Hook". The low-level keyboard hook will capture all user input data, but the working principle ensures that KurobaChan will not record any key entered by the user except for the set hotkeys. The full privacy policy can read at: https://go.misakacastle.moe/?fwd=krb_privacy_policy If you have any doubts about this, you can choose to click "No" to give up using this program. Do you agree to the privacy policy and continue? (This message will only be displayed before the very first launch or after the privacy policy updated)
